pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.5_1: ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.8_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.9_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.10_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.17.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.18_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena mahāpajāpati gotamī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.2_0: Therā bhikkhū yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.7_1: kappati bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo dhammaṁ desetun”ti kukkuccāyantā na desesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.8_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.9_0: Nisajja kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.13_0: Idāni pana—‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti, kukkuccāyantā na desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.15_0: Atha kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.16_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.19.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.1.16_0: na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā gantuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.1_0: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.2_0: Upasampannāya vematiko bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.3_0: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
